FLOW.COMMENT: This is the only step where you set errorInfo/ServiceName

MAP.COMMENT: [v1.1] Save Parent errorInfo so it doesnt Accidentally get overwritten if child service doesnt fail
This is the only step where you set errorInfo/ServiceName

BRANCH.COMMENT: Extract Order Status & Carrier Code for Error processing

MAP.COMMENT: Invoking httpPostToSiebel to send the SiebelMessage to Siebel

Values.value: Invoking httpPostToSiebel to send the SiebelMessage to Siebel
Calling bytesToString to convert the Siebel response to string

MAP.COMMENT: Check if the Siebel response contains an Error

INVOKE.NAME: %carrier% >= 0
INVOKE.COMMENT: Include CarrierCode: ERROR WITH HTTP POST - THROW EXCEPTION

Values.value:
Error HTTP POSTING to Siebel:
Header Code: %header/status% Message: %header/statusMessage% Order Status: %OrderStatus% Carrier Code: %CarrierCode% Response: %siebelResponseString%

INVOKE.NAME: $default
INVOKE.COMMENT: ERROR WITH HTTP POST - THROW EXCEPTION

Values.value:
Error HTTP POSTING to Siebel:
Header Code: %header/status% Message: %header/statusMessage% Order Status: %OrderStatus% Response: %siebelResponseString%
